name: Biller | Biller business invoice
author: Biller

sections.description:
Biller is designed to optimally serve both the business seller and buyer.
With Biller businesses buy now and pay later.
[site https://biller.ai ]

Biller business invoice. Let’s make buying easier, by empowering your business buyers to use Buy Now, Pay Later.
sections.installation:
General instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/biller-business-invoice directory,
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly (recommended).

Checking the installation

Your customers should be able to select Biller payment method in the checkoutpage.
sections.faq:
Do I need a Biller account to use this plugin?

Yes. In order to connect, you must register for an account and then, follow the installation instructions.
sections.changelog:
1.0.8

  • Add compatibility with WooCommerce High-Performance feature

1.0.7

  • Fix email object validation

1.0.6

  • Fix WP and WC sniffer issues

1.0.5

  • Add translation on error message after redirection

1.0.4

  • Add filter applying for billing and shipping address

1.0.3

  • Add compatibility with Sequential Order Numbers plugin

1.0.2

  • Fix error upon order status change to complete

1.0.1

  • Add support for additional countries and currencies

1.0.0

  • Initial release
